DOC.brief_summary: Effect of upper respiratory infection (URI) on diabetic subjects with a meal challenge
DOC.brief_title: Effects of URI on Diabetic Subjects Utilizing Technosphere Insulin After a Meal Challenge
DOC.criteria: Subjects will have met the same inclusion criteria as MKCTI030 Clinical diagnosis of URI with in 24 hrs prior to clinic visit and/or day of clinic visit At least 3 URI symptoms Prior participation in MKCTI112 MedHist, PE or lab findings of acute bacterial infection including but not limited to sputum prod., nasal/eye discharge, chest exam abnormalities, CXR findings of pneumonia.
